text: Jared Staal (born August 21, 1990 in Thunder Bay, Ontario) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player currently with the Charlotte Checkers of the American Hockey League. He is the younger brother of Eric Staal of the Carolina Hurricanes, Marc Staal of the New York Rangers, and Jordan Staal of the Pittsburgh Penguins. ==Career statistics== ===Regular season and playoffs=== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 2005–06 Thunder Bay Kings U16 AAA 64 24 25 49 72 — — — — — 2006–07 Sudbury Wolves OHL 63 2 1 3 18 21 1 0 1 2 2007–08 Sudbury Wolves OHL 60 21 28 49 44 — — — — — 2008–09 Sudbury Wolves OHL 67 19 33 52 38 6 0 1 1 2 2008–09 San Antonio Rampage AHL 5 0 0 0 0 — — — — — 2009–10 Sudbury Wolves OHL 59 12 37 49 125 3 0 0 0 4 2009–10 San Antonio Rampage AHL 5 0 1 1 2 — — — — — 2010–11 Charlotte Checkers AHL 13 1 1 2 2 — — — — — 2010–11 Florida Everblades ECHL 33 6 5 11 6 — — — — — 2011–12 Charlotte Checkers AHL 37 3 3 6 18 — — — — — 2011–12 Providence Bruins AHL 7 0 2 2 2 — — — — — 2012–13 Charlotte Checkers AHL 52 4 3 7 25 3 0 0 0 0 2012–13 Carolina Hurricanes NHL 2 0 0 0 2 — — — — — 2013–14 Charlotte Checkers AHL 50 2 5 7 23 — — — — — 2014–15 Charlotte Checkers AHL 63 7 4 11 27 — — — — — 2015–16 South Carolina Stingrays ECHL 64 12 12 24 23 6 1 0 1 2 2016–17 Edinburgh Capitals EIHL 44 12 21 33 14 — — — — — NHL totals 2 0 0 0 2 — — — — — ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Charlotte Checkers (2010–) players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Providence Bruins players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:San Antonio Rampage players Category:ECHL players Category:Ontario Hockey League players
